frontmatter.author: Jesus
frontmatter.title: How does it feel to carry that hate in your heart?  Does it lessen as the months go by?  It seeps into your days, your nights, until it consumes everything you once were.

frontmatter.author: Epictetus
frontmatter.title: Circumstances don't make the man; they only reveal him to himself.

frontmatter.author: L. Frank Baum
frontmatter.title: [O]ne is never so pretty after being mended, you know.
